channel.title: Account problems and order info
channel.description:
Hi everyone,
I had some problems to get information on my order and create an account, I'll explain better:
Thursday, October 18 I bought a core axoloti but I have not received an email order confirmation so I wrote to _johannes.taelman@gmail.com_ for info, but no answer.
I suspected that it was a problem with my email address and in fact, using another email address, I created my account! : -)
Now I hope that here is the right place to ask for information on shipping and estimated delivery times or, better, an order tracking number and so on.
thank you in advance Marcus

item.title: Account problems and order info
item.dc:creator: @Marcus8 Marco Di Palo
item.description:
@Marcus8 wrote:

Hi everyone

today I received confirmation of my purchase and the desired postal traking.
I received it on the mailing address that gave me problems with the account ...

... who knows what happened with my post,
but the important thing is that it's all solved! : -)

thanks to Mr. Taelman and his the staff
Marcus

Read full topic
